page.title: 19WHAT THE VILLAGE NEEDS
page.content: Class one carried out a survey of all the children in the school to find out what they thought was the most needed thing in the village. Of the children surveyed 31 would like to have a BMX cycle track built: 27 would like to see an adventure playgroumd built and equipped with scrambling nets, forts,swings,rope swings,slides,and items made of wood : 15 would like to see a roller skating rink : 3 would like a running track and finally 15 would like to see a Fish & Chip shop open in the village.
